lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Prudential Group Insurance learned in her early days of management that asking for help was O.K. (With video.)

headline.main: Lori Dickerson Fouché of Prudential on the Limits of Self-Reliance

snippet: The chief executive of Prudential Group Insurance learned in her early days of management that asking for help was O.K. (With video.)
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Lorie Dickerson Fouche, CEO of Prudential Group Insurance, who discusses here career and management style.
